itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break down the handshake felt around the world and the demise of the Browns, we preview both Game 5 matchups in the NLDS series tomorrow night in Major League Baseball, tonight's Astros vs Rays series, as well as pick the spreads for every College Football and NFL game this weekend.
